General.Name: Expo Holdings Inc
General.Description: Expo Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiary, D&D Displays, Inc., engages in designing, manufacturing, and distributing displays and cabinetry products and services in the United States. It sells its products to retail and customer-service industries. The company is based in North Wilkesboro, North Carolina.
General.Address: 116 Shaver Street, North Wilkesboro, NC, United States, 28659
